title: [GAMEPLAY] Risen Fiddlesticks No Skills
body:
I played an ARAM a moment ago with Risen Fiddlesticks. Could not use any skills until very late game. Even then, I used my R three times. Could not use summoners, either. 

Went into a custom with a random champ to see if it was a problem on my end and had no problem firing skills.

replies.body: Hey Harveena! I'm not able to repro this on my end. I'd suggest doing a client repair to be on the safe side. If you have this issue again, please feel free to ping me!
